short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web extension to switch on/off subtitles on Netflix

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension aims to eliminate the need to interrupt video and click on the subtitles to select them. Instead it provides a keyboard shortcut to achieve the same - select next / previous subtitles, turn them off. Currently works only on Netflix.

Press:
- Ctrl + s to turn on the next subtitles
- Ctrl + d to turn on the previous subtitles
- Ctrl + x to turn off subtitles

Enjoy!
